modName: XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation Pack
summary: A few of what I considers as essential mods created by Xenius compiled into one easy download.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Note: This is not my work, everything you can find in this compilation pack belongs to Xenius.[/b] Also, please note that the README in the 7z is outdated as I've made several changes to the README. If you're interested in reading the up-to-date version click the README tab.

Long story short: There is no all-in-one download of Xenius' mods, so I've compiled them so others will be able to download them without going through pages and pages to figure out which one is more updated and which one you're supposed to download. The mods I've picked and compiled is lore friendly, so mods like Xenius' Dryad race won't be included.

===================
[b]Requirements:[/b]
===================
A genuine copy of Skyrim updated to at least 1.9.32.0.8
The official High Resolution Texture Pack
Dawnguard DLC
SKSE 1.6.16

=================
[b]Installation:[/b]
=================
1. Use NMM / Extract the files located in the 7z archive into Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim

2. Create an SKSE folder in your Data folder if you don't have one.

3. Within the SKSE folder create SKSE.ini and add the following into the .ini file.
[b][Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048[/b]

4. Enable the esp file if you wish to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21081/?]XCE - Morrowind Warpaint[/url].

===================
[b]Included Files:[/b]
===================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356/?]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url] (1.13)
[quote]Currently integrated mods:

Detailed Faces
Detailed Bodies
Detailed Lips
No More Blocky Faces
High Quality Eyes
High Resolution Scars
Weathered Warpaint and Improved Dirt
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox (Edited to fit body skin color)
FemFeet by Phygit (Edited to fit body skin color)
Lashmaker Eyelash Alpha Resource by Mr Dave (Edited)[/quote]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21081/?]XCE - Morrowind Warpaint[/url] (1.1)
This is the addon version (aka non-replacer)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21839/?]XCE - Dawnguard[/url] (1.0)
XCED-OPTIONAL is not included in this compilation

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21082/?]XCE - Brows[/url] (1.0)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/944/?]Better Beast Races v2[/url] (2.0)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29977/?]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url] (1.0)
Includes Beasts_Tints-1_00 by MaianTrey
